title: Mako
writer: Ahmed Halim, Mohamed El Hafnawy, Mohamed Khaled
short_cast: Nicolas Mouawad, Basma, Manzer Reyahna, Amr Wahba, Nahed El Sebaï, Sarah Elshamy, Feryal Youssef, Mohamed Mahran, Murat Yıldırım
cast: Nicolas Mouawad, Basma, Manzer Reyahna, Amr Wahba, Nahed El Sebaï, Sarah Elshamy, Feryal Youssef, Mohamed Mahran, Murat Yıldırım

desc: Visiting the site of a sunken passenger ship, eight divers face a terrifying threat beneath the surface of the Red Sea. Inspired by real events.
